https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3jQsFqoXsIOFOC2uZKt1Gxuwxqc.jpg Two years after the tragic loss of his older brother, 17-year-old Daan unwillingly goes along when his grieving family decides to give shelter to a homeless teenager called Radja. But as Daan witnesses how this stranger's presence deeply affects his mother, he starts to unravel Radja's mysterious past. Bastaard
